name: Luann Davidson
review: Perfect place to experience wild life ... perfect river side resort ... kids enjoyed a lot!

name: Tara Stevenson
review: Nature at its best with streams jungle & mountain view.Guide to help you travel the place, who has an independent knowledge of the area.

name: Angelina Santiago
review: This property have excellent environment and staff is well mannered, we all our ISAD team enjoyed every moment of our stay

name: Cherie Frederick
review: I had a great experience, they take you to the Jeep safari where you can click the photo and take the full view of wildlife. I really like Nature Wanderers work.

name: Clayton Garcia
review: One can find wide variety of flora and fauna especially different types of birds. Also good and healthy atmosphere.

name: Hooper Merritt
review: I  had my first tour with Nature Wanderers at Ranthambore and it exceeded my expectations -- mentor Shivang Mehta was a cool and unobtrusive guide who did not throw his weight around .
